title: জুলাই গণঅভ্যুত্থান দিবস উপলক্ষে আগামী ৫-ই আগস্ট বিদ্যালয় বন্ধ থাকিবে
description: জুলাই গণঅভ্যুত্থান দিবস উপলক্ষে আগামী ৫-ই আগস্ট বিদ্যালয় বন্ধ থাকিবে

title: We are saddened for the milestone tragedy
description: 🕊️ A Nation in Tears. A Future Lost. 🖤 Today, our hearts are shattered. We mourn the innocent souls—bright students, beloved teachers—who lost their lives in the devastating crash at Milestone School & College. What should have been a normal day in the classroom became a nightmare. We cannot begin to imagine the pain of the families, friends, and community affected by this tragedy. 💔 No parent should have to bury their child. 💔 No classroom should turn into a grave. As a brand built by youth, for youth—we stand in silence, in solidarity, and in sorrow. From all of us at Palashbaria Secondary School, we send our deepest condolences. We remember the lives lost. We demand answers. We pray for healing.
